statements: UPDATE LiteratureAnalysis SET title='New Title', authors='John Doe', publication_date='2022-01-01' WHERE paper_id = 1;
UPDATE LiteratureAnalysis SET keywords='science, research, analysis' WHERE paper_id = 2;
UPDATE LiteratureAnalysis SET publication_date = '2022-03-15', title = 'New Title', keywords = 'test', authors = 'John Doe' WHERE paper_id = 1;
UPDATE LiteratureAnalysis SET title = 'Updated Title', publication_date = '2022-04-20', authors = 'Jane Smith', keywords = 'analysis, research, study' WHERE paper_id = 2;
UPDATE literature_articles SET title = 'New Title', author = 'John Doe' WHERE article_id = 1;
UPDATE citation_records SET citation_date = '2022-01-15', citation_text = 'This is a new citation' WHERE citing_article_id = 2;
UPDATE literature_articles SET author='John Doe', title='New Title' WHERE article_id=1;
UPDATE citation_records SET citation_text='This is a new citation!' WHERE citation_id=2;
UPDATE research_papers SET title = 'New Title' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE research_papers SET publication_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE research_papers SET title = 'New Title 1', authors = ARRAY['Author 1', 'Author 2'] WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE citations SET paper_id = 2, cited_paper_id = 3 WHERE citation_id = 1;
UPDATE research_papers SET paper_title = 'New Title', publish_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE paper_id = 1;
UPDATE keywords SET keyword_name = 'Machine Learning' WHERE keyword_id = 3;
UPDATE research_papers SET paper_author='John Doe', publish_date='2022-10-01' WHERE paper_id=1;
UPDATE authors SET author_affiliation='University XYZ' WHERE author_name='Alice Smith';
UPDATE literature_sources SET author = 'Jane Doe' WHERE source_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE research_articles SET topic_id = '456e7890-e12a-34b5-c678-901212130000' WHERE article_id = '789e2345-e56c-78d9-d012-345612344000';
UPDATE literature_sources SET title = 'New Title', author = 'New Author' WHERE source_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE research_articles SET publication_date = '2022-10-15', summary = 'New Summary' WHERE article_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001'
